attributes.action: ALL CLERGY WITH SEXUAL ABUSE CONVICTIONS SHOULD BE SACKED AND THEIR PARISH TOLD OF THEIR HISTORY.
attributes.additional_details: EVERY PRIEST IN BRITAIN MUST DISCLOSE IF THEY HAVE EVER BEEN CONVICTED OF ANY CRIMINAL OFFENCE, IN PARTICULAR, OFFENCES OF A SEXUAL NATURE AGAINST CHILDREN. HOWEVER HISTORIC, THEY MUST BE FORCED TO REVEAL THEIR PAST HISTORY TO THEER PARISH.
